

```{r, 'mono-table'}
read_csv(here("data", "tidy", "table_mono_model_summary.csv"), na = "NA") %>% 
  mutate_at(.vars = c("Estimate", "HDI"), 
            str_replace, pattern = "-", replacement = "&minus;") %>% 
  mutate(Parameter = str_replace(Parameter, "x", "&#215;")) %>% 
  knitr::kable(format = "pandoc", 
    align = c("l", "l", "r", "r", "r", "r"), 
    caption = "Model summary for VOT and burst metrics as a function of 
               language (English, Spanish), phoneme (/d/, /t/), F1, F2, and 
               item repetition for monolingual coronal stops. The percentage 
               of the HDI contained within the ROPE is based on an effect size 
               of &plusmn; 0.1.", 
    label = "mono-table")
```


(ref:plot-monolinguals-d-t) Posterior distribution comparing the short-lag stops, English /d/ and Spanish /t/. The white point represents the posterior mean &pm; 95% HDI and the grey region represents the ROPE (&pm; 0.1).

```{r, 'plot-monolinguals-d-t', echo=FALSE, fig.cap="(ref:plot-monolinguals-d-t)"}
knitr::include_graphics(
  here("figs", "mono_post_hoc_d_t.pdf")
)
```
